thread.title: 15 deeply awkward things that happened at the Oscars 2017
thread.title_full: 15 deeply awkward things that happened at the Oscars 2017

author: harpersbazaar.com
title: 15 deeply awkward things that happened at the Oscars 2017
text:
The Oscars 2017 took place last night and, as well as the biggest names in film donning their best outfits for the red carpet, they endured - and caused - some of the evening's most awkward moments, too. 1. When Warren Beatty read the wrong envelope for Best Picture
#Oscars shocker: Warren Beatty reads the wrong Best Picture winner, 'La La Land' didn't win — 'Moonlight' did. pic.twitter.com/iB6TLxyTn5
— Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 27, 2017
 Historic. After the cast and crew of La La Land had given acceptance speeches for the 'Best Picture' Award, Warren Beatty explained he'd been given the wrong envelope and that Moonlight had actually won the award.
2. When Michael Strahan called Matt Damon 'Ben'
Did Michael Strahan just call Matt Damon "Ben"? #Oscars pic.twitter.com/TPP2XK4Lg3
— Nicole Maffeo Russo (@nicolerusso) February 27, 2017
